channel.title: 508- ADVANCED Packet HELP!

item.title: 508- ADVANCED Packet HELP!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Ok. Im using a Bulby base, and Ive added gwd, trading, ect. without a single problem. Now adding Private Messaging. Everything works good: You can add a friend using the button, you can delete, and then when you try to PM the person (it says if they’re online or not) it says “Player is unavailable.” It does this because it says to in my code:

PacketManager.java

case 178: name = p.stream.readQWord(); int numChars = p.stream.readUnsignedByte(); String text = Misc.decryptPlayerChat(p.stream, numChars); for(Player p2 : Engine.players) { if(p2 != null && p2.online) { if(Misc.stringToLong(p2.username) == name) { p2.frames.sendReceivedPrivateMessage(p2, Misc.stringToLong(p.username), p.rights, text); p.frames.sendSentPrivateMessage(p, name, text); return; } } } p.frames.sendMessage(p, "Player is unavailable."); break;

However, I know the other person IS available. I’m assuming it has something to do with my if statements. I need someone with experience with 508s to help. Got any ideas?

Read full topic
